mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STYLE (STYLE_NO, STYLE_TAG, STYLE_CONTENT, STYLE_WRITER) VALUES(SEQ_SNO.NEXTVAL, #{styleTag}, #{styleContent}, #{styleWriter})
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT (FILE_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL, REF_NO, TYPE_NO) VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath}, 1, SEQ_SNO.CURRVAL, 3)
